review_content: The after sales service isn't very good, l purchased a 2nd chair the end of December 23 for my daughters 40th birthday in February. I rang gardens4less to ask if there were any problems when opened in February would l be able report any problems with the chair and l was told no  you need to open the chair now.As I have purchased items from this store before and never had any problems l just put the phone down and not impressed.

review_title: Garden table just what I've been looking for.
review_content: Delighted to find a firm which sold the Hartman Amalfi 6-seater garden table separtely as I didn't want the full set with chairs.  Prompt delivery and the driver was very helpful.  The included instructions for assembly were hopeless but I managed to find someone who could do it for me!  Very happy with the product - thank you.

Bought a breakable item as a Christmas gift and it arrived very swiftly and incredibly packaged to ensure that it did not get damaged in transit. We will be using the straw for many other garden activities!

I ordered the rhubarb forcer and it is such good value for money compared to everywhere else. It was packaged very well, be prepared for lots of straw! This was a gift and it was very much appreciated.

Having recently purchased a cover for our garden table and chairs, it was very disappointing to discover a tear along the centre seam.  Following my telephone call to Garden4Less, I was asked to submit photos and, within an incredibly short amount of time, I was assured a replacement cover would arrive within 48 hours...and‚Ä¶ within 48 hours of flagging up the problem, the replacement has arrived.This is certainly exceptionally impressive, prompt and decisive service.Faultless!!!

review_title: Absolutely fab service and Christmas purchase very quick‚Ä¶
review_content: Absolutely fab service and very quick delivery definitely be using again
Very good after sales advice. Delivery driver very considerate and hid delivery out of sight of main road.

I didn‚Äôt read the part were these were delivered on a pallet.  I didn‚Äôt have anyone to help when the chairs arrived   It was absolutely throwing it down with rainThe delivery driver just put them on my pathThe boxes got absolutely soaked !!They are still in my garage unpackedDisappointing experience

Garden furniture cover arrived promptly - Hartman Heritage Bistro Set CoverProduct Code : 60202101The cover has been in use for a few weeks now and is holding up well in the current stormy wet weather. I am so glad we bought it.

review_title: Fantastic product at a great price
review_content: We purchased a lovely Kettler garden sofa set at a great price compared to other stockists (¬£500 saving). Had a slight problem with delivery date, which I‚Äôd put down to distribution centre rather than Garden4less. Overall very happy with our purchase & wouldn‚Äôt hesitate to order from this company again.

review_title: Really pleased with our Hartman Amalfi‚Ä¶
review_content: Really pleased with our Hartman Amalfi 8 seat dining set. Online ordering was easy and delivery arrived on promised timescale in early April with good communication ahead of delivery.  Very well packed. Online assembly instructions really helpful.Delayed writing this review until Summer arrived because initially weather meant we weren‚Äôt using the furniture.Now we‚Äôve used it we can confirm seats are very comfortable and we hope to have many years of use - table and chairs seems strong and sturdy.Much admired by visitors. Definitely recommend both the product and the company.

review_title: Easy to order and arrived safely‚Ä¶
review_content: Easy to order and arrived safely packaged. Very pleased with purchase as it works well so I can keep the two hosepipes attached to the tap and can fill my watering can too. The water flow dials are easy for me to turn and being able to leave on tap stops damage to the hose connectors with the previous attaching and detaching and helps with my limited strength in my hands.
Ordering was easy, delivery was quick and the items arrived well packed and in good condition. There was nothing to complain about and would order again from this company. Thank you Garden4less.

review_title: Need to exchange faulty Hozelock Auto‚Ä¶
review_content: Need to exchange faulty Hozelock Auto reel where manufacturer cannot be bothered to make internal hose connection correctly - total incompetence. This is a common problem with manufacture. Promised replacement this week but not yet dispatched. Shockingly poor service, so far needed 3 emails and 2 phone calls. So it is a busy time of year, we are all busy

The purchasing process was very good from start to finish. The only possible issue was what would have happened if we‚Äôd been out? We were supposed to be advised when the delivery was due. We never received call, but luckily we‚Äôd just got back in. The driver said everyone says that!!

Excellent experience. Had already decided what garden dining furniture we wanted and found Garden4less was best price. We wanted a slight change to colour of parasol and cushions so started on live chat to discuss before they then rang me and we organised the deal. Very helpful friendly chap who sounded knowledgeable and mature. Offered good advice on choices. Paid extra ¬£5 for delivery day we wanted. Purchased on a Tuesday and delivered on the Thursday.  No dramas. Purchased Hartman set which whilst expensive is well made. Would use again.

review_title: Received faulty garden set in May.
review_content: Received faulty garden set in May.. have contacted the company many times and just being fobbed off. Cannot use one of the seat cushions as badly stitched and one of the chair legs have started unravelling, ( woven) Hartman Bistro set, it's now July and still no response.Next step Trading Standards?They suggested I contact them via phone which I did 10 days ago..empty promises..obviously still not interested in my faulty garden set, very keen to take my money‚Ä¶very upset and disappointed‚Ä¶really do need to take this further‚Ä¶

This lovely statue came to us in perfect condition and looked exactly as it did on the website.  The detail is remarkable with no blemishes.  Customer Service was very good, answering all my queries quickly and clearly. Next time I am looking to add something to my garden I will be looking at Garden4less first!

review_title: Hartman dining table and chairsThe customer service was superb
review_content: Loved the website very easy to use and buy productsThe customer service was superb - delivered on time on the date plannedThe Hartman furniture that we bought we love the quality is the best and at a very competitive priceHave recommended your company to friends

Bought a garden set with parasol and base (best price!).  The set arrived well packaged and on time - unfortunately the base had been missed from the order.  Had to hold for just a little while on the phone for customer service - but it‚Äôs summer and they‚Äôre understandably busy - explained the issue. No proof was required - just my word. Email confirming base would be delivered the following day was received within an hour and the base duly arrived.  Mistakes happen - could not have done more to rectify asap.

I didn‚Äôt read the part were these were delivered on a pallet. review_title: A quality product for a very good price.
review_content: A quality product for a very good price. Fast free delivery, no complaints at all. I would not hesitate to use the company again.

We ordered a set of Hartman table, chairs and parasol. Unfortunately the order arrived without the parasol base. I contacted customer services who were excellent and a base was sent out the following day. Unfortunately the concrete base arrived but it was broken in half. I contacted customer service and again they were extremely helpful and a replacement was sent which this time arrived intact. We then noticed one of the chairs was cracked. I spoke to William Bourne who was very helpful, I emailed a photo and he arranged a replacement which was delivered the next day.I think we were very unlucky to have so many issues with our order but the customer service was so exceptional I would not hesitate to buy from them again or recommend to friends and family. Thank you.
Quick delivery. Nice table, easy to put together, perfect for the small space we had for it!No dramas, easy to order! What's not to like?

review_title: The package was delivered damaged and a‚Ä¶

review_title: Very pleased with our recent purchase‚Ä¶

Great quality product, great delivery,
Have ordered from this company many times and have always been happy with everything from products ordered to being kept upto date with delivery status ,would highly recommend

This lovely statue came to us in perfect condition and looked exactly as it did on the website.  The detail is remarkable with no blemishes. Very helpful at customer service.  Delivered within the week.  Would buy from here again ‚≠êÔ∏è

I bought a pair of boots online but they didn't fit.The return label enclosed was for Screwfix, so I made the assumption that Screwfix probably own the company.  Not the case. Wasted 40 minutes on the phone to Screwfix trying to sort out what to do.When I finally spoke to someone at Garden4less they said, oh must have sent you the wrong form from the factory and they could not have cared less.  All you want when you are stressed or upset by something is kindness.  Not dismissal.  On top of that there is no free return label - so on top of everything I have to pay to return the goods which was not made clear on the website. Would I use them again: Absolutely No; would I recommend them: Absolutely Not
Excellent product and already attached to the reel, which was very helpful. Good quality hose, reel and attachments. Easy to wheel around the garden. Would highly recommend this company

I ordered a parasol for my garden table, however when it arrived the box was not intact. The driver noticed it and took a picture. When my son assembled it in the table, we noticed a large crack down the pole. Worse than that, it dosent even open up with the pulley/rope system, so I've wasted my hard earned money on a piece of rubbish somebody had obviously sent back. I asked for a refund and sent pics but they wasn't interested.
The cover is excellent quality, fits my furniture perfectly and keeps the furniture and cushions really dry even in torrential rain. Delivered quicker than stated.

Had the absolute worst customer service from Lewis at Garden4Less. Rude and extremely distasteful. Dealt with manufacturer directly myself and had a brilliant outcome. Good prices at Garden4Less but what‚Äôs the point if you get terrible service/ after care.

review_title: I purchased a hartman table cover as it‚Ä¶hartman table cover
review_content: I purchased a hartman table cover as it stated it had 4 corner toggles that could be tightened to prevent it blowing off in windThe guidelines for use that was supplied stated ensure the corner toggles are tightened.the cover has a elastic loop on the 4 ends which have no toggles and cannot be tightenedI have got no joy from speaking to this company who insist that the elastic loop is the toggle .this is not correct only suggestion was to return at my expense and time for a refund.Company fobbed me off and description does not match what I have received I will have to go to further expense of buying garden clamps to prevent this blowing off in wind....very unhappy and will now not order the matching sofa set covers

review_title: Easy to order with rapid confirmation
review_content: Easy to order with rapid confirmation, competitively priced, prompt notification of delivery and goods accurately processed. Hassle-free.

review_title: Item was just what we wanted and was‚Ä¶
review_content: Item was just what we wanted and was delivered promptly

After sitting in many of these type of egg chairs around garden centres etc., which were all uncomfortable, I took the chance to order this.  It looked robust and comfortable - and it was.  Would thoroughly recommend paying the extra for this, as it will last for years with care.  Plus the seat folds for the winter, a must.

review_title: Do not buy from this company
review_content: Do not buy from this company. We ordered some garden furniture to find that when we unpacked it several cushions and seat pads were missing. Spoken to someone on live chat who said they would arrange for these to be sent to me and she would update me when out for delivery. Had no update- so called and got told it was Megan dealing with it so they would get her to call or email me with an update. Several weeks later, still no update so called again and spoke to a very rude male who said they were short staffed and he wasn't after sales so can only read what's on screen and that Megan would have to update me. I mentioned I'd been told that before and was still waiting to which he reiterated Megan would need to call me on Monday. Still awaiting an update and my missing cushions...

Absolutely delighted with my purchase.  The price was very competitive which initially appealed but I had never purchased from them before so was a little dubious. The product was shipped quickly. I was kept informed of the order and all was packed very well, even the courier was friendly amd helpful couldn't be more pleased.
Recently bought the Life Timber lounge set with adjustable table. Very impressed with the quality, design and comfort. Would recommend this product and Garden4less who offer keen prices.

review_title: Great Price for a quality box.
review_content: Great Price for a quality box.Very easy to assemble - took me about 20 mins.Keeps cushions, etc. dry.

review_content: I already had some of this furniture so I knew the quality to be expected and was not disappointed. Easy to order and delivered when expected. Would have given 5 stars but for the pallet delivery! As 70 + pensioners this was a challenge to move.

review_title: Great Gazebo well made and robust,at a‚Ä¶
review_content: Great Gazebo well made and robust,at a great price. Easy to assemble clear instructions.

Table is fabulous fits perfectly where I wanted it. Packaged well. The cover is as expected. I thought it was overpriced but it‚Äôs easy to use and will protect my sofa. So good value. Delivered exactly when expected.

review_title: We bought a Hartman Heritage Tuscan 6‚Ä¶
review_content: We bought a Hartman Heritage Tuscan 6 Seater Elliptical Dining Set in Ash / Slate.  While the seating is OK it is definitely not worth ¬£2,600 and not even ¬£2,049 at the discounted price.  Moreover, the quality of the cushions are shocking, with the seating foam now collapsed after two weeks.  On ordering and paying for a named date we asked for some kind of tracking and the attitude over the phone was very disappointing.  'Nothing we can do... sit an wait'.  Even with my small company you can track our items.  The packing was something to be admired, thrown onto pallets and lightly tied with clingfilm.  While we are going to keep the items and find new cushions we won't return to this business.

garden4less were good and delivered on time the quality of the product is shocking the feet don't fit properly holes don't line up for the bolts to go through this will not last more then a couple of years defiantly not worth the money !!!!!

review_title: Need to exchange faulty Hozelock Auto‚Ä¶
review_content: Need to exchange faulty Hozelock Auto reel where manufacturer cannot be bothered to make internal hose connection correctly - total incompetence. This is a common problem with manufacture. Promised replacement this week but not yet dispatched. Shockingly poor service, so far needed 3 emails and 2 phone calls. So it is a busy time of year, we are all busy

Shed arrived well packaged. On opening it was neat and tide, every part was labelled and identified, well impressed. Constructing the shed was easy with the detailed manual, my daughter and I had the shed erected and finished in 4 hours. Looks great and is really sturdy. Thank you.

review_title: Fabulous product exactly what we wanted‚Ä¶
review_content: Fabulous product exactly what we wanted quick service and very helpful delivery driver

Delivery team were really helpful.Arrived on time.Goods had a small fault which I managed to rectify without contacting the supplier.Covers can be marked quite easily, so must be kept out of rain etc. but are removable.

review_title: The storage box isn't too bad but the lid holds rain water as it dips in the middle!
review_content: The storage box isn't too bad but the box was badly damaged and one of the small stiffening gussets in the top was broken. I did report it along with photographs of the damaged part and the box. Somebody did Email me and asked if I wanted the part replacing and I said there was no point as it would probably get damaged in transit! The box wasn't secure in the courier's van, it was thrown on top of other goods and more goods were on top of it. The Courier just dragged it out. I never heard from your Customer Service again, not even an apology.

Bought a garden set with parasol and base (best price!).  The set arrived well packaged and on time - unfortunately the base had been missed from the order.  Had to hold for just a little while on the phone for customer service - but it‚Äôs summer and they‚Äôre understandably busy - explained the issue. No proof was required - just my word. Email confirming base would be delivered the following day was received within an hour and the base duly arrived.  Mistakes happen - could not have done more to rectify asap.

review_title: Offered a competitive price for goods
review_content: Offered a competitive price for goods.Held the delivery until I was ready to receive.When one of the items was missing they despatched a replacement straight away.

Be very wary ordering from this company. When an item is delivered damaged with missing parts they are useless at responding. I was ignored for a week until I lodged a paypal claim. Now I've also provided video of delivery showing the parcel open/insecure theyre hesitating in responding again.The UK summer isn't long enough to spend wasting it with such poor after sales.
Best price, shortest delivery, great service.

Well informed of day and time slot for delivery. Brilliant product, well packed and good quality.Priced competitively. Only disappointment was I couldn't buy a matching side table and had to go to another company.

review_title: Easy to order website and fast delivery

review_content: The chair, though very nice, arrived damaged. I've reported this twice to Garden4less who acknowledge, but then ignore, emails, so can't recommend unfortunately

review_title: Quick delivery and very good product.

review_content: Excellent service and first class product, very pleased

review_title: Two parts missing and no real help
review_content: Two parts missing and no real help - ended up talking to the manufacturer.

Product delivered later than specified. Packaging damaged, Product inside very rusty and inside of box absolutely filthy, I suspect packaging was left in wet dirty warehouse for some. Have requested replacement. No reply to my 2 emails. Web chat I eventually got a reply saying "let me sort you a replacement". Needless to say haven't heard anything else. My advise is shop elsewhere.
Great product. Excellent delivery time and information. No adverse issues. Easily constructed from flat pack delivery.

review_title: Really pleased with our Hartman Amalfi‚Ä¶
review_content: Really pleased with our Hartman Amalfi 8 seat dining set. Online ordering was easy and delivery arrived on promised timescale in early April with good communication ahead of delivery.  Very well packed. Online assembly instructions really helpful.Delayed writing this review until Summer arrived because initially weather meant we weren‚Äôt using the furniture.Now we‚Äôve used it we can confirm seats are very comfortable and we hope to have many years of use - table and chairs seems strong and sturdy.Much admired by visitors. Definitely recommend both the product and the company.
Prompt delivery after ordering and delighted with the quality of the table and chairs. Chairs came in one piece and the table only took 20 mins to put together and everything fitted perfectly.
DO NOT BUY - my daughter and I have both been injured in these chairs - contacted company and been completely ignored - disgusting
Excellent product - Excellent Price.

Over this past year we have purchased two Hartman garden furniture sets from Gardens4less both of which are good quality and reasonably priced. Delivery was extremely fast and handled professionally. The staff at Gardens4less are very polite, helpful & efficient. However, on both orders there have been parts missing and endeavouring to get them posted out has been difficult to say the least! This last order of 9th May we were missing all the washers to assemble the bench seat (so we bought some from B&Q) also some rubber lugs that support and level the glass table. For the past month we have had to support the corner underneath with folded paper taped to the leg to equal the level and enable the table usable. We have telephoned four times so far and have been told each time that they would be sent out 1st class. We are still waiting! This is extremely disappointing and has transpired into what would have been a good experience into a bad one.

review_title: Garden furniturePerfect for what we wanted
review_content: Perfect for what we wanted. Good quality. Good service all round.

review_title: Delighted to give Garden4Less a review
review_content: Delighted to give Garden4Less a review. We found a dining set in a garden centre that could not deliver to our address. A quick search showed they were taking orders with a delivery date. Always suspicious I messaged and they assured me stock was coming and I only needed to place a deposit to secure the stock. ¬£50 down I waited and sure enough the email arrived (roughly as stated) to say the stock was available and once I settled the full amount they would despatch. I did, they did and delivery was within a few days.Everything was as expected with the dining set so no need to use aftersales however delighted with purchase and service throughout.
Really quick delivery. The table was easy to set up and does look nice when lit. We found that it didn‚Äôt give as much heat off and uses quite a lot of gas

Having seen the garden furniture set we liked priced at ¬£2200 in a garden centre we took a gamble with gardens for less being ¬£1600.Somethings got be wrong!!!!No... Delivered very quickly by nice guy, boxed new, complete and undamaged..... Brilliant, looks very nice.... Be aware it's on pallets and boxes are big, not heavy. Just check you can see you get it in

review_title: Fantastic product at a great price
review_content: We purchased a lovely Kettler garden sofa set at a great price compared to other stockists (¬£500 saving). Had a slight problem with delivery date, which I‚Äôd put down to distribution centre rather than Garden4less. Overall very happy with our purchase & wouldn‚Äôt hesitate to order from this company again.

Excellent product (Hartman garden coffee table.A little disappointed that the pack of fixings were missing, but a very quick phone call to Aftersales resulted in a follow-up delivery within a week or so, combined with email notifications of its progress.

review_title: First thermostatically controlled propagatorHave now used this propagator for about‚Ä¶
review_content: Have now used this propagator for about 4 weeks and have been impressed with it's ability to hold the temperature steady.  One slight disappointment is that the trays are a few millimitres too neat a fit for some of the seed trays that I already use - both full and half size.
Delivered very quickly, well packaged and my daughter was delighted with her gift.
Well designed, lightweight so easy to assemble and move, beautifully made and lovely colour.  Not the cheapest but well worth the cost.  Really pleased with purchase.
Good price, quality product as described - delivered on time

review_title: Ordered a keter storage box on 2.05.23...still waiting. ‚Ä¶
review_content: Ordered a keter storage box on 21.05.23. To cut a long story short I am still waiting for my delivery. I have not had an apology from this company. They have refused to give me my money back or issue a replacement. Its funny as I can see another customer had the same issue with this item in April. TNT are saying gardens4less have never handed over the item. Gardens4less are telling me they have and refuse to give me any money back until they supposedly resolve this issue with TNT. 3 days ago I was promised a response either that day or following day. I've heard nothing. Save your money and go spend it at a company where they actually care about their after sales and customer service. I will now go through my credit card to recover the money. Think you should change your name to gardens4nothing. Disgusting service.It's also a shame why you cannot respond to emails however have responded straight away on here. My email remains unanswered in your inbox.

review_title: Purchased a Kettler Chalbury patio set‚Ä¶
review_content: Purchased a Kettler Chalbury patio set which we are really pleased with it‚Äôs so comfortable and during our purchase experience the staff were really helpful. We also went on to purchase the all weather patio covers to enable us to keep our set in perfect condition regardless of the weather. It‚Äôs so nice not to have to pack away all the cushions and throws but simply throw on the covers. Excellent! Would highly recommend the product and the Company we purchased from

review_title: From order to delivery - bad news!
review_content: We were looking for a garden bench and on 18/05/23 found one we liked with a delivery date of 22/05/23.However we did not place order then but did so 19/05/23 delivery 23/05/23.Once order was placed delivery notice said 2-5 working days which could be as late as 26/05/23!We contacted Garden4less and were told it would be delivered by 02/06/23!Nine working days from order to delivery is bad news these days when some Companies can do following day or 2-3 days max. No more orders from us!.UP DATE - six days on and still no delivery! How do they exist - you can't on excuses such as being busy!
Very well packaged, delivered in good time.  Perhaps a little overpriced but a good product.
Easy to buy from, delivered on time with no issues
Product as describer - super quick delivery.
Great service they kept me informed on delivery which arrived on the stated day
Great price and excellent delivery options.

This company is all hunky dory until you have an issue. I purchased a double egg chair less than 2 months ago and the soldering on one of the legs of the chair is appalling and has come away from the connecting frame. I contacted the company 3 days ago  via email, included pictures of the issue and I am still yet to receive a response. I decided to also contact the company on the Live Chat, which doesn't even seem to be live and I have received no response. Why have a facility if you cant even staff it?? 72 hours to receive a  response is a geneorous amount of time until you start to feel let down by this company. This item has been sold and is clearly not fit for purpose with this defect. A ¬£370 egg chair is not even usuable and this company seems to ignore you! All I wanted was for this to be rectified with a replacement frame. Is that too much to ask?  I will be contacting Trading Standards about this matter as this item is not fit for purpose and the company isn't acknowledging my emails. Very dissapointed, as initially things went well with my ordering etc...now, not so well :(If they do come back with a response trying to fob me off with contacting the manufacturer, as they have done with others on here..I hope they are aware of the Consumer Rights Act 2015 which states:This means that your statutory consumer rights are against the retailer ‚Äì the company that sold you the product ‚Äì rather than the manufacturer.****Update***** 14th June 2023So yes the company have got in touch with me but now its all gone silent with no knowing what is happening. They've accepted that a new frame should be sent, but now it's gone radio silent. It will be coming up to a month from when I first got in touch with them and I still have no replacement :(

Lovely chair and fast delivery.  The chair went together well, just a slight hiccup with one of the poles - there was a blob of solder that my husband had to file down to fit the other pole in.  We are now enjoying the sunshine in our lovely double egg chair.

review_title: Good product but one seat cushion was‚Ä¶
review_content: Good product but one seat cushion was wrong size . This was quickly put right by the customer service.
Great service,friendly staff when speaking on the phone,delivered when said and most of all lovely and well made garden furniture.Thank you
Excellent replacement for previous Hozelock junction unit. Prompt service from Garden4less as normal.

Amazing company. The product I wanted was out of stock and I was told it would be a long wait but hey would contact me when it was back in stock. Despite the wait they were true to their word, informed me they had the product back in stock and it was despatched quickly and in good packaging. Would order from this company again.

review_title: Kettler Charlbury Sofa Lounge Set with Coffee Table
review_content: We purchased the "Kettler Charlbury Sofa Lounge Set with Coffee Table" from Garden4less.  Delivery was very quick and the driver was very helpful. We found one chair foot was bent so it wouldn't sit level.  This wasn't a problem as we are quite local to their offices and the chair was swapped the same day.  We collected the replacement chair ourselves to save time and the lads in the yard were extremely helpful and polite, even loading it into the car for us.  10 out of 10 for helpfulness, price and customer service, thank you.  ps: the Kettler quality is amazing.

I saw this furniture set in a garden centre for ¬£1200 more (yes, ¬£1200!). I called Garden4less to check it was the same and the guy who I spoke to was very helpful and answered my questions. The set arrived, well packaged and it took around 20 minutes to put the table together.  I'm over the moon with my purchase, especially on saving so much money.

review_title: Terrible Customer Service and not resolved my sofa issue
review_content: I would rate as no stars if I could I have never received such appalling service from any other company.I ordered the Hartman garden furniture in January 2023 and paid upfront, I was told it would be available in March but then I heard nothing . I had to chase the company who advise it would be delivered at the beginning of April and I would be advised of the date for delivery prior to it being despatched.This never happened, a courier turned up with wet boxes and incomplete furniture. I sent an email advising that the furniture was marked and incorrect, they asked for evidence of this, so I took photographs but received no response from them . I had to call and email again to ask them what was happening they advised they would resend the corner sofa again. This time I received a date, we got the corner sofa but again the parts were incorrect and we were unable to put it together as we had been sent the wrong parts.  They then passed the buck and told us to contact the Hartmann rep to see what was missing as they didn‚Äôt believe us when we said we were unable to fit the sofa together. We did this and the Hartmann agent confirmed it was the wrong piece of furniture to complete the corner sofa. As of today May 16 2023 I am still waiting for a response from GARDENS4less and I do not have the furniture.I have spent over ¬£2000 on this furniture it‚Äôs truly appalling I have never received such worse service. Do not use this company
Fantastic service, super quick delivery highly recommend thank you, Hartman Vienna Corner Sofa, superb quality

review_title: A Company that you can trust.
review_content: Ordered a Hartman Corner Unit from G4less and really pleased with William's (the Manager) team. Very professional and curtious. Slight hickup with delivery but not G4less fault. Will always deal with them,

review_title: Garden set was lovely but damaged
review_content: Garden set was lovely but damaged . Unfortunately as we needed it for a family event we had to assemble it . Only option was to replace but was too late to do anything about it . Would of been nice to have been offered some money back from it
Lovely product and good price. Great delivery process. Actually speak to a real person!

review_title: The garden tools I purchased arrived in‚Ä¶
review_content: The garden tools I purchased arrived in neat packaging, reflecting the attention to detail and care of the seller. From browsing to checkout, the transaction was smooth, making it a hassle-free experience for any gardener in need of reliable tools.

Excellent experience. Had already decided what garden dining furniture we wanted and found Garden4less was best price. We wanted a slight change to colour of parasol and cushions so started on live chat to discuss before they then rang me and we organised the deal. Very helpful friendly chap who sounded knowledgeable and mature. Offered good advice on choices. Paid extra ¬£5 for delivery day we wanted. Purchased on a Tuesday and delivered on the Thursday.  No dramas. Purchased Hartman set which whilst expensive is well made. Would use again.
They deliver quickly and their site is easy to use. I've never had a problem with an order and happily recommend them.This time it was Hunter's wellington boots and they are fine.

Third time I've used Garden4Less in the last year or so and they've been excellent every time. They're competitive on price but it's their customer service that puts them ahead of the field. Thoroughly recommended.
Fantastic chairs.  The ability to separately raise the footstool and recline the back is just great.

We saw this garden set in a garden centre and then found it on Garden4Less several hundred pounds cheaper. They were excellent to deal with and kept us informed regarding expected delivery to the Western Isles. The delivery was as stated and the delivery guys even took it in to our back garden for us. Excellent service, quality and price and we are extremely pleased with our new garden furniture. Thank you Garden4Less.

Life Timber corner aluminium garden furniture, a lovely quality product. There was a suspect weld on one of the chairs and the company quickly replaced the item and compensated for some staining. Excellent customer service. The dark seats of the product gets very warm in full sunlight but I read this on a review previous to making my purchase and quite like the warmth I am pleased it did not sway my decision.
Really great customer service and support. Highly recommend Garden4less.

Good range of products to choose from to suit different needs. Competitive prices. Ordering easy, clear instructions about availability and subsequent delivery arrangements. Communication about delivery time and notification of delivery date clear.  Delivery on time and service excellent. Very happy and would recommend.

review_title: Still waiting for a 24 hour delivery.
review_content: Still waiting for a supposed 24 hour delivery. Had to ring as email not answered and then given the excuse it was down to another firm. Had to point out that the contract was with them not the other firm. The best that they could offer was a phone call back in 3 days. What a joke company. Will probably be 2 weeks for a 24 hour delivery if I am lucky. I find it strange that there were no emails from dpd and they did not come to my door as suggested as my cctv confirms. A total fabrication

Ordered a Keter storage box from here and paid extra for next day guaranteed delivery. Item was despatched via XD however item never arrived and despite contacting them through their live chat and repeatedly emailing, I have had no response whatsoever from Garden4Less. They have no interest once they have receive your money and I am now in touch with my bank in order to recover the funds. Disgusting customer service and I would advise going elsewhere if you‚Äôre considering purchasing from here.

I bought a Keter Ontario XXL Deck Storage Box from G4L as the price was good when I compared it to other online retailers. The communication prior to delivery was excellent and the order was delivered on time and undamaged. A first class experience from start to finish. Highly recommended.
Great garden furniture. Excellent communication and customer service making the delivery arrangements easy.

review_title: Goods as described and very good price
review_content: Goods as described and very good price.  Excellent delivery.

I ordered over ¬£2k worth of futrnitire from this company.  Part of the order was fine but the comfy chairs came very badly damaged.  The box had been placed on Its side on a pallet despite the the sign saying ‚Äúthis way up‚Äù. The box was almost split in two but I was hopeful that contents might be ok. Unfortunately they were not. There were scratches and dents all over.In addition the fire pit we ordered was missed off the delivery.  This was despite me calling to confirm it would be on the same delivery.I now only have half of what I need for the weekend party I had planned!  Beyond disappointed!

We waited months for a terra cotta rhubarb forcer which cost ¬£80/90 and which disintegrated during the one winter it lasted. Deemed to be frost resistant (though not frost PROOF) the item is now of no use whatsoever and the company will take no responsibility nor will recompense us in any way. The item is not fit for purpose and should never have been sold.
Great communication. Product arrived on time and the table and chairs set is gorgeous.
Perfect product,just as advertised,fitted perfectly
We are really happy with our furniture and can't wait for some decent weather to use it!

review_title: I appreciate the variety of brands and‚Ä¶
review_content: I appreciate the variety of brands and types of garden tools available at this store, and the staff was happy to help me choose the right tool for my needs.

review_title: Ordered a garden dining set for March‚Ä¶
review_content: Ordered a garden dining set for March 2023 delivery & it arrived on time. It was delivered today & whilst I've taken it off the pallet, I've yet to check it over but so far I am pleased with the experience. My only little niggle, which may not have anything to do with Garden4less is that I wasn't informed that the delivery was going to be today, thankfully I was home. The delivery guy was brilliant, brought the pallet right up to my front door & took the pallet away for me too. 5* service from Garden4less on my 1st experience using this company, I would definitely recommend them!

Great products, competitive prices and swift delivery.  However, couldn‚Äôt have been more unhelpful with the last piece of furniture I needed to complete my collection. I now have garden chairs, garden bench and a side table to get rid of as G4L won‚Äôt help me source a dining table.
Order was easy to place, friendly and helpful service.  Product was received within three days as promised.  Cannot fault. Will definitely use them again.

Ok I ordered two sets of the Charlbury Kettler dining sets from these guys and when they arrived one of the tables was damaged. They asked me to send photos, which I did and they very happily sent out a replacement. I dealt with one of the managers Simon who was very apologetic and a very good asset to the company. I have subsequently purchased another outdoor coffee table from them. Very happy with my purchases and service. Angela Wright

review_title: Will always buy from this trader.  his item arrived on the date promised
review_content: This item arrived on the date promised.  Well packed.  What more could on want?

I placed an order for 4 sofa covers and the order confirmation said the goods would arrive in February.Last week, in mid March, I was sent a dispatch email. I was told dpd would deliver the goods at a particular time. I stayed home that day but nobody arrived. I received an email saying they tried to deliver and nobody was home. I complained to customer services but they told me the goods were delayed because they weren‚Äôt in stock in the first place (not true and besides the point, as I had patiently waited 6 weeks without complaint) and that I had to collect from a local store or wait another week for delivery. They refused any acknowledgment of error on their part and refused any compensation. I then asked them to cancel the order and issue a refund, but they said they would issue the refund only once dpd returns the parcel to them. A parcel I never received that I have waited 7 weeks for!Probably the worst customer service experience I have had in a long time.

review_title: Easy to order and delivered as expected‚Ä¶
review_content: Easy to order and delivered as expectedGood service and would order from this company again
Great price, great product fast delivery, what‚Äôs not to like
Excellent price - great product and fast delivery. Will definitely use them again - highly recommended!
Easy to order!! Delivery excellent! Price good, 2nd time I have bought from Gardens4less!
A very good company, we bought some Winnawood garden furniture, was a good price with delivery to the North Scottish Islands. They kept in touch too with a delivery timescale.

STAY AWAY FROM GARDENS 4 LESS. They are a rip off.I had a chat regarding a Life corner sofa set that I wanted and had been keeping an eye on. I could see there was more than 10 in stock.Suddenly the set was out of stock so I decided to have a chat session online and was told, Gardens 4 Less still had the corner sofa in stock however had sold out of the coffee table but instead would add in a foot stool for the same price.I explained to the chat sales person I had no need for the foot stool but would like to purchase the corner sofa on its own, which he stated he would send me an email quote.I didn‚Äôt receive any email from so decided the next day to go on the chat service again and have a look at the product again.I was sick to my stomach when I saw the price for the same set double!!! Why was this? I felt hard done by as it made me feel I wished I‚Äôd not enquired about it. The price for the set doubled the next day I had the chat.I still continued to have a chat now with who had told me I could have the corner sofa set without the coffee table but for the new increased price which was now double, what a cheek!!!Stay away from Gardens 4 Less and if you do decided to buy anything buy it online with no chat or support from the Gardens 4 Less team otherwise they will double the price of the product online.Like I have written the prices were ALWAYS the same till I had a chat conversation then the next day the Life corner sofa and coffee table doubled in price!!! This is really not right to treat potential customers like this. Like I was promised a quote just for the corner sofa that you STILL have in stock but sold out of the coffee table. Why would you sell the coffee table alone when it‚Äôs in a set?.The price for the Life Mallorca corner sofa set in larva/carbon was ¬£1699 for a while then the next day after I enquired about it, I didn‚Äôt get a quote emailed to me, so I went back online to start a new chat the next day and saw the price increase for the same set ¬£3149!!!Appalling!!!!!!

review_title: Happy with delivery happy with customer‚Ä¶
review_content: Happy with delivery happy with customer service happy with garden set just need to use it in summer days.Overall happy with this company from order to delivery.. thank you.

review_title: Great item with great price delivery‚Ä¶
review_content: Great item with great price delivery was very quick and easy.

review_title: As usual I look at Amazon first !
review_content: As usual I look at Amazon first to get an idea of the price for the item I want. The price and selection was better at Garden4less and I will definitely be happy to buy from then again in the future.

review_title: Very pleased with all the items I have‚Ä¶
review_content: Very pleased with all the items I have received from Garden4less. It was my first experience of using this company. Everything went smoothly from ordering to notification of availability & delivery. I highly recommend this firm to other customers who  want first class customer care & quality products.

review_title: Very good products and first class‚Ä¶
review_content: Very good products and first class service
Speedy delivery and clear communication. Would definitely use company again.

Bought a lounge set on line. It arrived quickly. I waited a couple of days to unpack it. It was well packaged but the small table was missing. I contacted Garden4less by telephone and there was no issue. They apologised and quickly sent out the missing item, keeping us informed. The table arrived well packaged and we now have a beautiful garden lounge set at a much cheaper price than other on line retailers were selling it for. I would definitely recommend buying from them.

Prompt delivery. Great sales price. Product arrived well packaged. Haven‚Äôt had chance to use the sofa set yet as it‚Äôs winter, so it‚Äôs gone into storage. Tried it out in a garden centre prior to purchase and it looks really smart. Really big solid, no maintenance and robust furniture set. Brilliant.

review_title: We knew what furniture we wanted for‚Ä¶
review_content: We knew what furniture we wanted for the Garden and went to a large department Store that we have used before .No one helped us in the store so we sat on the said furniture and found your website.The furniture was a lot cheaper. So much that we were able to buy the fire pit and still save ¬£400 on the furniture.Delivery was very quick .The Furniture was so easy to put together as with other Kettler products we have bought.Will definitely be using Gardens4less again and will recommend to friends and family.
Wellies purchased for a good price, very quick to arrive too.
Superb product superb service actually arrived on the date they said , easy to put together and extremely well packed
Easy website to use. Swift checkout and super delivery. Item was received as expected, well packaged and a great price! Thank you Garden4less! Definitely recommend, 5 ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

review_title: Frost Resistant Terracotta Rhubarb Forcer that cracks in frost
review_content: I bought a Terracotta Rhubarb Forcer 18 months ago advertised as Frost Resistant and the first bit of frost it cracked all over. Only 12 month warranty so they will not help as they state at the very bottom of the webpage, bring it inside when temperatures drop below zero!  Is it, or is it not Frost Resistant? Disappointed with their response.

review_title: Ordered a garden dining set today from‚Ä¶
review_content: Ordered a garden dining set today from Gardens4less, Simmon the online sales guy, was excellent . Fingers crossed the product arrives as efficiently and as promised.Many Thanks Wendy

review_title: Bought two recliners and coffee table‚Ä¶
review_content: Bought two recliners and coffee table from this company I phoned before and explained that we are elderly and asked a bought delivery I was told that the driver would help with package and not to worryThe chairs and table arrived It was on a pallet and in cardboard boxed piled high The driver used a device and put in the garage I asked for help and asked them to take pallet if nothing else Was told NoPhoned company and they said couldn‚Äôt help This is terrible delivery Please remember if you use this company this is what happens
Great company punctual delivery nice product

review_title: I received our new garden table and‚Ä¶
review_content: I received our new garden table and chair set is extra quick time and it‚Äôs lovely. Not had an opportunity to use yet but we‚Äôve set it up and ready to go. The cushions seem extra comfy and I‚Äôm looking forward to the summer now. Thank you
Quick efficient delivery from the company and Greta communication. Just a bit disappointed with the product as it leaks a lot around the connectors to the tap which is annoying and wastes water.

I ordered these wellies quite near Christmas and was very pleased they arrived promptly, beautifully packaged and in perfect order.I managed to get them at a really good price too.I know they are a good product because I have had my last pair for over forty years!

review_title: I have used Garden4less a couple of‚Ä¶
review_content: I have used Garden4less a couple of times recently.  I bought a garden parasol and base on sale just before Christmas.  Today I received a stone Peter Rabbit.  I am very pleased with the company and the items I purchased.  Delivery was prompt with notification of dispatch and delivery.   Many thanks.
Quick delivery and cheapest around. Would use again
Great experience with this company. Easy to use website, item was delivered within 2 days, exceptional service
Really good product and prompt delivery. Perfect for a small roof terrace

Received my Lafuma chair quickly, after being kept up to date regarding delivery. When ordering Garden4less were quick to answer questions I had about the item and other products. I would recommend the company and definitely order from them again
Great prices, Quick delivery and quick dispatch!
No hassle,delivered quick. Great service

review_title: High quality furniture at extremely competitive prices. Excellent customer service.
review_content: I‚Äôve only just discovered this company while comparing prices for garden furniture online. Their prices for top quality garden furniture could not be beaten.Ordering was straightforward and the website a pleasure to use. The online chat facility works very well and if the answer isn‚Äôt immediately available they will go and look and get back straight away.The furniture is absolutely beautiful and was carefully packed and delivered. It is stored away in my garage until the Spring.The courier was first rate. They delivered very quickly and rang me in the day to check I was going to be in.I was so pleased with the furniture and the excellent customer service that I went back for more in the Black Friday sale.Thank you Garden4less.

Garden4Less were very helpful, replied to all my emails. And the water butt looks sturdy and compact.  But... I had to wait two months for my order to arrive - I do understand there were manufacture/supply problems but they took my money off me at the very beginning knowing there was a considerable delay, I think I'm owed a bit of a discount to be honest.  Also the diverter kit looks cheap and cheerful and drips at the butt end when full, plus leaks at the tap, so this rather defeats the object of having a water butt. Was ordered in August, delivery originally for September but was eventually nearer the end of October, so the below date of 18.10.22 is only a rough estimate.

review_title: Came on time and very pleased with the‚Ä¶
review_content: Came on time and very pleased with the product.Will certainly use again and recommend.

review_title: I was skeptical‚Ä¶but I was wrong!!
review_content: So before I placed my order, I checked the reviews on trust pilot and there were a lot of bad ones which made me question whether I should order a pair of Hunter wellies or not‚Ä¶. I decided to give it a go and everything went through fine! I was kept up to date with postage updates and the item arrived really quickly!Everything was intact, packaged well, etc. Amazing service all round

review_title: Not used the Hose yet keeping it ready‚Ä¶
review_content: Not used the Hose yet keeping it ready for next season.
Great service! Product very good
Great valueExcellent productWellies arrived promptly and as described, would highly recommend and cheapest I could find online and great quality
Good price, good service, genuine product. The purchase was made online and executed very well.

review_title: Thr ladies i dealt with were excellent‚Ä¶
review_content: Thr ladies i dealt with were excellent , even searching the stores for one item and finding the only one left.Beyond the call of duty
Excellent delivery service and product good
Quick delivery. Very pleased with this trolley.  Easy to pull even over slightly bumpy meadow land.Very useful item

Although the purchase and delivery were very good we stored the item unopened for 1 month as we didn't need to use it, unfortunately when we did open the sack truck to use it to move house we found one side of the axle was shorter than the other and the wheel would not lock on, as we had had it a month and needed it there was no point in trying to return it, a local engineer was going to try and weld a nut onto the axle to keep the wheel on.The moral of this is to check the goods when they arrive, this was my mistake so my responsibility and bears no reflection on Gardens 4 Less
Easy to order, product is great and was far better on price than other suppliers.Very well built and easy to assemble. Delivery was earlier than expected, overall, a great service.
Excellent personal service. Goods at competitive price with free next day delivery. A company that obviously values their customers
Ordered chair delivered within two days‚Ä¶great chair ..great delivery service‚Ä¶10/10 from me ‚úÖ

AVOID AT ALL COSTS !!!******************************Products not sent in original box and were a gift , delivery slow and communication Aweful.See other negative reviewsDon‚Äôt bother shop elsewhere !!!

review_title: Rung about table cover to ask if fitted‚Ä¶
review_content: Rung about table cover to ask if fitted my table. They said yes, no problem. When cover arrived, I tried to fit over table it didn't.  Rung company to explain what had happened, they denied saying the cover was to fit my table, and said could return, but would have to pay for it. I won't be ordering from them again.
Fast delivery product as described could ask for anything else

review_title: I ordered a pair of childrens hunter‚Ä¶
review_content: I ordered a pair of childrens hunter wellies and one of the boots was very marked with scratches and scuff marks so the same day I received the product, I contacted customer service with pictures expecting a straight forward exchange but they disagreed completely and wouldn‚Äôt do anything about it. I would never order from this company again, even though the wellies were cheaper it wasn‚Äôt worth it. I‚Äôd much rather order for a decent company with respect for their customers that provide good customer service if issues arise and pay more. So I‚Äôd stay clear incase you happen to be u lucky enough to receive a faulty product you‚Äôd be stuck with or fighting hard for any sort of exchange or refund.
Excellent products, great value for money with very prompt delivery - would definitely recommend
Great product and fast delivery! Highly recommended
